The gauge builds stacks of <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Addersting<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> when the barrier effect of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Eukrasian Diagnosis<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is completely absorbed. <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Addersting<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> stacks can be used to execute actions such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Toxikon<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Toxikon II<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Eukrasia

<UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Eukrasia<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, when active, can be used to enhance the effects of <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dosis<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Diagnosis<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Prognosis<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
You can view the job gauge description at any time from the Actions & Traits menu.
Balance Gauge

<UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Mana Stacks<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> are gained by executing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enchanted Riposte<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enchanted Zwerchhau<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enchanted Redoublement<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Enchanted Moulinet<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, and are consumed by casting spells. At maximum stacks, you can cast <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Verflare<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Verholy<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> (acquired at level 70).

The <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Balance Gauge<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> displays the current amount of <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Black Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>White Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> a red mage has accumulated. <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Black Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> is accumulated by casting spells commonly associated with black magic (such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Fire<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> or <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Thunder<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>), and <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>White Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> by casting spells associated with white magic (such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Aero<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>). There are also some spells and actions that affect both.

When both <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Black Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>White Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> reach a certain amount, weaponskills such as <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Riposte<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> become enchanted and will deal additional damage. If the gap between <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Black Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>White Mana<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> accumulation grows too large, the crystal at the top of the gauge will change color, and it will become more difficult to accumulate the lesser of the two.
You can view the job gauge description at any time from the Actions & Traits menu.
